text:
Amazon | Software Development Engineer | Seattle, WA | Onsite

Come shake things up within Amazon's Big Data Technology team. Our analytical engine is powered by a wide range of distributed solutions running at scale. We are working on some of big data's hardest optimization and platform challenges. As as software development engineer within the big data team you will help create the secure storage engine that powers Amazon's business.

For more information (and to apply) visit: https://www.amazon.jobs/en/jobs/453209
